snippet.title: WWF Attitude - Official Promo Trailer (Beta)
snippet.description:
The official promotional video for WWF Attitude video game, for N64, PlayStation & Sega Dreamcast. This promotional trailer is from 1999.

WWF Attitude is a professional wrestling video game based on the World Wrestling Federation released by Acclaim Entertainment in 1999 for the PlayStation and Nintendo 64. A slightly enhanced port of the game was later released for the Dreamcast, as well as a handheld version for the Game Boy Color. The game is named after the slogan of WWF's marketing campaign at that time with the tagline "Get it!"
